授業目的:
The main objective is to improve the students’ ability to discuss issues in English.
The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標:
By the end of the course, students will be able to:

1. Improve speaking and listening skills more through group discussions, presentations, and debate.
2. Become more familiar with personal and social issues in society.
3. Gain more confidence to express their opinion related to these topics.
4. Develop more critical thinking skills.
5. Develop more skills for academic writing.
授業方法: The instructor will be a facilitator of various tasks to help students connect with each other and speak English. There will be ample opportunity for pair work. This section is scheduled to be a face-to-face section (with masks). Students be sure to follow the school's announcements and follow instructions, as necessary.
